articles.content: "On behalf of all of the guest hosts, I want to say thank you so much to all of the loyal Wendy watchers for making this show a success. And most of all, we have to thank you, Wendy Williams," she sa… [+552 chars]

articles.title: Austin Butler on His Elvis TRANSFORMATION - Entertainment Tonight
articles.description: Austin Butler chats with ET's Nischelle Turner about his physical transformation into the 'King of Rock & Roll' for 'Elvis.' The actor opens up about how he ...
